general.description: This base was established by explorers, former survivors of the prison ship incident. They never found the purgatorian artefacts they were searching for, but established instead a smuggling route between Arythem and Baartish, going around the patrolled Long Link and the Joint Peacekeeper Corps.
general.bar: Mostly sshaad and rithai Spacers, celebrating freedom and free traders with large gulps of various intoxicants, probably smuggled in by passing ships !
